00022 #ifndef __MLPACK_METHODS_AMF_AVERAGE_INIT_HPP
00023 #define __MLPACK_METHODS_AMF_AVERAGE_INIT_HPP
00024 
00025 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace mlpack {
00028 namespace amf {
00029 
00037 class AverageInitialization
00038 {
00039  public:
00040   // Empty constructor required for the InitializeRule template
00041   AverageInitialization() { }
00042 
00043   template<typename MatType>
00044   inline static void Initialize(const MatType& V,
00045                                 const size_t r,
00046                                 arma::mat& W,
00047                                 arma::mat& H)
00048   {
00049     size_t n = V.n_rows;
00050     size_t m = V.n_cols;
00051 
00052     double V_avg = 0;
00053     size_t count = 0;
00054     double min = DBL_MAX;
00055     for(typename MatType::const_row_col_iterator it = V.begin();it != V.end();it++)
00056     {
00057       if(*it != 0)
00058       {
00059         count++;
00060         V_avg += *it;
00061         if(*it < min) min = *it;
00062       }
00063     }
00064     V_avg = sqrt(((V_avg / (n * m)) - min) / r);
00065 
00066     // Intialize to random values.
00067     W.randu(n, r);
00068     H.randu(r, m);
00069 
00070     W = W + V_avg;
00071     H = H + V_avg;
00072   }
00073 };
00074 
00075 }; // namespace amf
00076 }; // namespace mlpack
00077 
00078 #endif
